title: Cursor changes during [GAMEPLAY] with renekton
body:
As far as this latest patch 5.11 every time I play Renekton top lane, usually when I'm executing a combo for trading, my mouse cursor will change to a full diamond shaped box with a dot in it.  It is the same shape when executing a ping.  This bug causes me to not be able to utilize my pings in anyway and prevents me from clicking on the minimap as well as clicking on enemies to see their stats and items.  After enough time with the bug it eventually corrects itself but then with more combos the bug presents itself again.  I can't figure out what button combos are initiating the bug but its very easy to replicate.  Just play a game with rekenton and see for yourself.  
Please fix as I cannot easily communicate with team via alert pings, utilize the minimap, nor can I click on my enemies to find item info on them.

replies.body: Can confirm. Made a post but no comments. Its good that this post got some form of attention. Now Rito, cone give a comment or just hope for the best that it gets fixed.

This happens on every champion. It is a direct result of using quick cast with indicator. 

> [{quoted}](name=My Full Post,realm =NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=qhhmohHo,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-28T21:08:55.191+0000)

This.

Casting any ability pretty much fixes it for me

Casting an ability... fixes it for you? Did you mean causes it? Or does casting an ability actually fix the diamond targeting indicator in particular? It's only gone away randomly for me after right clicking minions and crap.

Moving around or AA'ing doesn't do anything for me.

Anything that brings up a range indicator fixes it however, such as an ability or item/ward, etc.
This has happened to me on every champion recently.

This is happening to me too. Especially when playing Ryze in teamfights, and Cho too.

*To revert this I usually exit the client and reconnect.
You can Q to get rid of it, I've done it a few times and it seems to work consistently
HOW TO FIX: Activate a trinket or ward, and and rightclick out of it's cast zone to cancel it. Happens to me all the time with Rene.

I just had the same bug with Darius only it seemed to be from unit collision. Anytime a champ would "bump" into my champ the diamond icon he spoke of would appear and I would be unable to click on anything except to walk. I couldn't auto attack or target a champion usually until i died. Totally threw a game for me. I wish they would make this stuff public knowledge. I lost a ranked game cause of this glitch.
Darius and Zyra have the same problem

Yeah his e (slice n dice) is what's causing it.  I got this when I tried him in teambuilder since he was on free week and haven't tried him again since.
The bug would get stuck when I'd e then it would unbug next time I used it (after the cooldown) then bug back up next cast.

The post I found when I was looking into it is: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/JmE9xVue-gameplay-renekton-cursor-bug
apparently the bug has been there since 5.10.

This is certainly an issue because I constantly get it every game. It most likely has something to do with the abilities/Smart Cast function. It isn't just abilities though from my experience. It also stays like this if you Attack Move. (The A Key + Click) Hopefully this gets resolved soon and I don't know if other posts are being made like this.

There's something similar with Ziggs and someone else.
Ziggs' W is using the "point/unit target" cursor instead of the "circular aoe target" cursor.
When I played renekton I was having the same problems, Couldn't ping but moving and skills still worked. But it was annoying to not be able to ping for help and back away and others.
I have the same issue with Rek. It also seems to conflict with burrow / unborrow type abilities.
